title: GIPMER Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 05 Senior Resident Posts
description: Govind Ballabh Pant Institute of Postgraduate Medical Education and Research (GIPMER) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 05 Senior Resident Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS can grab this chance and apply for the GIPMER Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the walk-...
